input:
Write an ad for the following product

Product: QOOLA is a portable air conditioner with an ion purifier that is suitable for daily lives in urban areas.

Tone: informative, convincing, scientific

Audience: health care consumers, college students, salesman

Aspects 1 : QOOLA can be used for air cooling and heating in the range of 15~45 celcius degree.

Aspects 2 : QOOLA contains stainless steel plate which can cool or heat body instantly.

Aspects 3 : 4 cooling and heating modes for every customer's needs

Aspects 4 : Negative ion purifier can filter contaminants such as micro dust, pollens nearby user.
sentences: QOOLA is a portable air conditioner with an ion purifier that is suitable for daily lives in urban areas. It can be used for air cooling and heating in the range of 15~45 celcius degree. QOOLA contains stainless steel plate which can cool or heat body instantly.
Looking for a quality air conditioner? Look no further than QOOLA! Our portable air conditioner with ion purifier is perfect for daily use in urban areas.

QOOLA is a portable air conditioner with an ion purifier that is perfect for city living. It can be used for air cooling and heating in the range of 15-45 degrees Celsius, has four cooling and heating modes, and a negative ion purifier to filter out contaminants.
